alert.note: Alert for Duval; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 4:39PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Duval and southeastern Webb Counties through 515 PM CST... At 439 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Bruni, or 20 miles southwest of Freer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Duval and southeastern Webb Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
